content.rendered:
Directed by George Kirby. Harry Kirby

Written by Scott Adkins. Stu Small. Stu Small

Star Scott Adkins(Mike Fallon). Ray Stevenson(Big Ray). Perry Benson(Finicky Fred). Sarah Chang(Wong Siu-ling). Javad Ramezani(Jan). George Fouracres(Dante Zuuzer). Flaminia Cinque(Mrs. Zuuzer). Beau Fowler(Poco The Killer Clown). Faisal Mohammed(Yendi). Andreas Nguyen(Oyumi). Peter Lee Thomas(Silas). Adam Basil(Armando). Chris Bonello(Shopkeeper with no Maltesers). Jean Carbonaro(Body double of SILAS). Albert Dibben(Bouncer). Maxime Durand(Pooparazzi). David Fox(The Architect). Steffi Thake(Black Boar Barmaid). Matteo Trogu(Pooparazzi). Zara Phythian(Freya Du Preeze (uncredited))

Language Action. Comedy. Crime

Producers Scott Adkins. Craig Baumgarten. Mat Braddy. Kathleen Debrincat. Ben Jacques. Joe Karimi-Nik. Erik Kritzer. Paul Parker

Production Wonder Street. Fiction Films. LINK Entertainment
